other.title: Introduction to GraphQL
other.description: Interested in learning more about backend development? Learn all about GraphQL, a new way to write your backend APIs!

other.title: Intro to Relational Databases & SQL
other.description: Come learn about the basics of relational databases and SQL in this introductory workshop! We'll be covering a wide variety of topics including what exactly databases are, how relational databases work at a high level, and how we can use SQL, a database querying language, to query and store all kinds of data.

hack.py.title: Introduction to Python pt. 1
hack.py.description: Ever wanted to learn how to code but haven't had the opportunity to do so? Python is a great place to start! ACM Hack will be hosting 7 Python workshops for beginner and novice programmers. These will range from basic Python lessons to more complicated topics such as web scraping, web development, and working with data.

hackschool.title: HTML/CSS
hackschool.description: You always hear the question, "Do you like to code?", but do you actually know, have you ever coded, or do you want to get better to even answer this question? Come by Hack School: Learn the MERN, our workshop Bootcamp to teach you how to create a web application from start to finish using full stack techniques. We start by going over how to style & format your webpages using HTML/CSS, then dive deeper into backend code to create the logic to your application, and finally, deploying your application online.
